channel.title: Maker of Software and Photographs on Tahir Hashmi

item.title: Tahir's Bio
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: e-commerce guy, camera junkie, father of two

item.title: Career
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: 20 years of experience in software development, leadership and innovation at 100M+ user companies valued over $10B. Domain experience in e-commerce, cloud services, gaming and social media.

item.title: Hello Photographers!
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: I hope to write more about photography here soon. In the mean time, do feel free to check out my old photography blog and my flickr photostream.
